items.organization: National University of Singapore, n-House Subcommittee
bullets: Organized and coordinated two networking events, including fireside chats with Iterative's Hsu Ken Ooi and NUS Enterprise's Neelash Bhatia.
Facilitated discussions with NUS NOC inbound students from multiple countries, surfacing global startup insights.

items.organization: National University of Singapore, Orientation Group Leader
bullets: Led the NUS School of Computing e-Freshmen Orientation Programme for a cohort of 30 freshmen.

items.organization: National University of Singapore, Orientation Organiser
bullets: Organized the Electrical and Computer Engineering Camp for over 100 incoming freshmen, designing programming and logistics.
Co-led over 100 members to orchestrate the Secondary One orientation camp and mentored a class through their first year.
